messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] FW: [RUL] So. Cal. Whale Watch Trip
messages.msgSnippet: Hey, I m a radical unschooler in Sherman Oaks!  With an 818 area code, you can t be too far away from me. I saw the trip on the CalHS list. Too bad my kids are
messages.messageBody:
Hey, I'm a radical unschooler in Sherman Oaks! With an 818 area code, you
can't be too far away from me. I saw the trip on the CalHS list.

Too bad my kids are too young for the trip! I know you say suitible for all
ages, but this mom is not up to a boat ride with a almost 5 yo, 3 1/2 yo and
11 month old girls! Trying to watch them at the park takes 6 pairs of
eyeballs. I can't even imagine a boat. The "big" girls would love it,
though.

Nice to know there are other unschoolers around my neck of the woods. How
old are your children (or child <g>)

Amy
> Contact me ASAP if you are interested. I must have a minimum of 75
> people to hold the trip. I would love to meet more unschoolers,
> especially radical ones:~)
>
> rcw@...
> leave message at 818-341-2651
>
> Thanks, Robin
>
>
>

messages.msgSnippet: Oh shoot!!!!!  I want to go...and bring my kids of course..  :) But, since I m in NC, that won t work. Have a great time! Ann
messages.messageBody:
Oh shoot!!!!! I want to go...and bring my kids of course.. :)
But, since I'm in NC, that won't work.
Have a great time!
Ann

messages.subject: FW: [RUL] So. Cal. Whale Watch Trip
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings fellow unschoolers, Are you in Southern California? I have just planned a whale watching trip aboard a tall ship for SATURDAY, APRIL 14th, departing
messages.messageBody:
Greetings fellow unschoolers,

Are you in Southern California?

I have just planned a whale watching trip aboard a tall ship for
SATURDAY, APRIL 14th, departing Long Beach Harbor at 10am returning at
1pm. They dissect a fish onboard, search for all sorts of interesting
marine life and birds, and give a demonstration of the old fashioned
cannons. Sounds cool, huh?
It is $15 per person, suitable for all ages
$5 deposit required

Contact me ASAP if you are interested. I must have a minimum of 75
people to hold the trip. I would love to meet more unschoolers,
especially radical ones:~)

rcw@...
leave message at 818-341-2651

Thanks, Robin
